des: "This is a basic West Indian curried chicken recipe.  Extremely easy to prepare and delicious with standard Caribbean fare.  Peas and rice go great with it!"
ins: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.  Cook the chicken, onions, and garlic until the chicken has browned; about 5 minutes.  Stir in potatoes, salt, and curry powder; add enough water to cover the chicken halfway.  Cover, and simmer until tender, 30 to 40 minutes.  Season to taste with hot pepper sauce.
